Date Unkown - Painting of George Stephenson by unkown artist. Stephenson is considered the "Father of Railways" with the "Stephenson gauge" still used as the standard for most of the world's railways

Date Unkown - Painting of John Bubble by an unkown artist. Bubble had a major influence on the development of Northen Coalfield and their saftey. Though working in many coalmines he started off his career working in Walllsend Colliery and died in Wallsend in 1843
